sentences.en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentences.cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentences.en: "Are you ready to pull out?"— 'I'm ready when you are. Captain.'
sentences.cn: “准备好出发了吗？”——“就等你了，船长。”

sentences.en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
sentences.cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

sentences.en: Captain David Clement and 150 commandos stormed the port this morning.
sentences.cn: 戴维·克莱门特上尉和150名突击队员今天早上对港口展开突袭。

sentences.en: Captain Shelton guided his plane down the runway and took off.
sentences.cn: 谢尔顿机长驾驶飞机沿跑道滑行起飞。

sentences.en: He captained the winning team in 1991.
I asked the Captain to wangle us three tickets to Athens.
sentences.cn: 我让机长设法给我们弄3张去雅典的票。

sentences.en: Our captain gave us a stern lecture on safety.
sentences.cn: 船长就安全问题严厉地训斥了我们一顿。

sentences.en: The Blackhawks’ team captain was the first to score.
sentences.cn: 黑鹰队的队长率先得分。

sentences.en: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
sentences.cn: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

sentences.en: The captain decided to withhold the terrible news even from his officers.
sentences.cn: 船长决定哪怕是对高级船员也要封锁这个可怕的消息。

sentences.en: The captain of the submarine has got this periscope thing.
sentences.cn: 那个潜艇艇长有个类似于潜望镜之类的东西.

sentences.en: The captain ordered all passengers and crew into lifeboats.
sentences.cn: 船长命令所有乘客和船员都进入救生艇。

sentences.en: The Captain pulled rank and made his sergeant row the entire way.
sentences.cn: 上校倚仗权势让他的中士划船划了一路。

sentences.en: The captain radioed that the ship was on fire.
sentences.cn: 船长发无线电说船着火了。

sentences.en: The captain swung his left foot, but sliced the ball wide.
sentences.cn: 队长飞起左脚一踢，球却侧着旋出去老远。

sentences.en: The Captain was at the other end of the room.
Then the chilling truth dawned on Captain Gary Snavely.
sentences.cn: 接着加里·斯内夫利船长意识到了这个令人不寒而栗的事实。

words.tran_cn: 首领或队长之职；统帅之才；将帅的资格

phrases.tran_cn: 库克船长（英国探险家和航海家）

trans.tran_cn: 船长，机长，上尉，上校，队长，组长
trans.tran_en: a military officer with a fairly high rank
to lead a group or team of people and be their captain
